mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_regdate, notice_viewcnt FROM notice_tb ORDER BY notice_no desc, notice_regdate desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO notice_tb ( notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, admin_number, notice_regdate
) VALUES ( seq_notice_tb.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer}, (select admin_number from admin_tb where admin_id=#{admin_id}), sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_tb SET notice_viewcnt = notice_viewcnt + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
